title: Best Christmas gifts for your boyfriend or husband 2019
text:

Make Christmas shopping for your other half fun again. With not long left to go until the big day - don't stress about gift giving.

We know that finding the perfect gift for the number one man in your life can seem like a chore.

But with so many silly, quirky, stylish and practical ideas to choose from - there's something out there for even the fussiest man.

No matter what your budget, we've had a look at some great tech, fashion and skin care options; that we're sure your man will love.

Keep reading below, to see our our top rated picks that you can buy in time for Christmas for your special man.

Best Christmas gifts for boyfriend/husband

1. Plug and Play Retro TV Games

From life's luxuries, to life's little luxuries - unleash and nurture his younger gaming nostalgia, with this plug and play games controller.

All you have to do, is plug in and play. Enjoy over 200 retro games like , Pongpong, Space Base and Wonderball - take yourself back in time and enjoy pixelated playing paradise.

Price: £8.99, Find me a gift - buy here now

2. Byredo Oud Immortel Eau de Parfum

For the man who likes to smell as good as he looks, this premium scent from Byredo will have him smelling like a dream, on Christmas day and beyond.

Using high-quality raw materials Oud Immortel combines a mixture of traditional and contemporary scents, giving off a unique aroma that is long lasting and easily layered.

We'd love to say this one is just for the guys, but ladies, it is a little bit for us too.

Price: £110, Space NK - buy here now

3. Triple Supercar Driving Blasts Gift Experience Box

If your special guy could best be described as an adrenalin junkie, treat him to a speed fueled day, because nothing says "Merry Christmas" quite like racing super cars.

Perfect for the motor enthusiast in your life, they'll have the difficult task of choosing from over 50 race car experiences. Take to the track and drive three super cars for three miles each. Strike a pose in a Lamborghini or zoom down the track in an Aston Martin - the choice is all yours.

For under £100, we're sure this is an experience they'll never forget.

Price: £89.99, Amazon - buy here now

4. Burgen Suede Moccasin Slippers

What better way to kick off Boxing Day, than cosy and comfortable in a nice new pair of slippers?

These chocolate brown moccasin slippers are made from super soft suede with a plush lining for extra comfort factor.

If you do need to go outside in them, the durable rubber sole provides excellent grip to ensure your safety. Although, we'd recommend them for indoor use, so they stay sumptuous for longer.

Price: £35, John Lewis - buy here now

5. Triumph and Disaster Do One Two Kit

As the increasing trend in male grooming shows no signs of stopping, treat the special man in your life to a little bit of skin R&R.

Triumph and disaster are the men's skin care brand to watch out for - their products aren't tested on animals and are derived from natural ingredients, all of which evoke old fashioned values from simpler times.

This kit includes a Ritual face cleanser and a Volcanic Ash and Green Clay face scrub, to help rid your skin of dirt, dead cells and sebum buildup; leaving you feeling revitalised and invigorated.

Price: 38, Triumph and Disaster - buy here now

6. Smeg Espresso Coffee Machine

If he's a coffee man, now he can wake up to his favourite hot beverages every morning, and in style.

Combining a fun retro style with practical coffee making, the SMEG espresso coffee machine is the ideal accent for any home.

With a handy cup warmer to keep your brews ready to go and a built in milk frother - he'll be on his way to delicious barista style coffees in no time.

Price: £255, AO - buy here now

7. Nestlé The Big Biscuit Box

For the simpler man, with simpler desires. Who wouldn't like their own personal biscuit box? Did we mention that there's 71 big biscuits to choose from?

Sit back, relax and enjoy 71 biscuits - that's about all there is to it. It's also under £15 which makes it a great budget gift too.

Price: 14.39, Amazon - buy here now

8. Cleer Audio Enduro 100 Wireless Headphones

If your significant other prides themselves as a bit of a musician, or they just like bobbing their heads on their morning commute, the Cleer Audio Enduro wireless headphones have a premium sounds with features not to be sneered at.

Enjoy up to 100 hours of constant playback on just a single charge, ideal for long commutes or weekends away. The battery also charges rather quickly, thanks to the USB-C connector.

Enjoy crisp quality sound and hours of your favourite tunes, uninterrupted.

The headphone will be restocked on Amazon mid November - right in time for Christmas.

Price: £169.99, Amazon - Available in November

9. Vancouver 15" Laptop Roll Top Backpack

If he's always stashing things away into your bag to hold, now he can hold it all for himself.

This stylish laptop backpack has a roll top and has a minimal but practical design, he's bound to love. A modern matt finish will further help to protect your luxuries from splashes and rain.

Add the finishing and complimentary touches to your outfit with this trendy accessory.

Price: £55, John Lewis - buy here now

10. Louis Vuitton Keep It Bracelet

This detailed and delicate piece of had jewellery is the perfect accent to keep your man stylish, whatever the occassion.

The Keep It bracelet has a historic Damier canvas and Louis Vuitton engraved on the silver finish metal lock - which is easy to open and close for convenient wearing.

It's a simple, yet timeless and masculine accessory that will compliment any smart or casual attire.

Price: £140, Louis Vuitton - buy here now
description: If you're looking for the perfect gift to present to your boyfriend or husband this Christmas 2019, we've listed some of the best below for inspo
